```{r make df}
mammal <- read.csv(paste0(mapath, 'mammal.csv'))
mast <- read.csv(paste0(spath, 'mast.csv'))
nutrition <- read.csv(paste0(spath, 'nutrition.csv'))

mplotBART <- c('BART_062', 'BART_012', 'BART_007', 'BART_084', 'BART_001', 'BART_015')
pplotBART <- c('BART_028', 'BART_012', 'BART_007', 'BART_011', 'BART_001', 'BART_015')
siteBART <- 'BART'

mplotBLAN <- c('BLAN_002', 'BLAN_001', 'BLAN_009', 'BLAN_003')
pplotBLAN <- c('BLAN_011', 'BLAN_001', 'BLAN_009', 'BLAN_018')
siteBLAN <- 'BLAN'

mplotGRSM <- c('GRSM_013', 'GRSM_070', 'GRSM_014', 'GRSM_069', 'GRSM_071', 'GRSM_003', 'GRSM_015')
pplotGRSM <- c('GRSM_013', 'GRSM_004', 'GRSM_014', 'GRSM_008', 'GRSM_011', 'GRSM_003', 'GRSM_015')
siteGRSM <- 'GRSM'

mplotHARV <- c('HARV_001', 'HARV_006', 'HARV_021', 'HARV_010', 'HARV_008', 'HARV_023', 'HARV_032')
pplotHARV <- c('HARV_001', 'HARV_006', 'HARV_021', 'HARV_010', 'HARV_008', 'HARV_023', 'HARV_022')

mplotORNL <- c('ORNL_002', 'ORNL_003', 'ORNL_007', 'ORNL_039', 'ORNL_001', 'ORNL_027')
pplotORNL <- c('ORNL_002', 'ORNL_003', 'ORNL_007', 'ORNL_012', 'ORNL_001', 'ORNL_027')

mplotSCBI <- c('SCBI_039', 'SCBI_002', 'SCBI_035', 'SCBI_008', 'SCBI_004', 'SCBI_003')
pplotSCBI <- c('SCBI_016', 'SCBI_002', 'SCBI_013', 'SCBI_008', 'SCBI_004', 'SCBI_003')

mplotSERC <- c('SERC_008', 'SERC_007', 'SERC_014', 'SERC_015', 'SERC_011', 'SERC_031')

pairs <- data.frame(c(pplotBART, pplotBLAN, pplotGRSM, pplotHARV, pplotORNL, pplotSCBI, pplotSERC), 
                    c(mplotBART, mplotBLAN, mplotGRSM, mplotHARV, mplotORNL, mplotSCBI, mplotSERC))
colnames(pairs) <- c('plant', 'mammal')


mplots <- levels(pairs$mammal)
pplots <- levels(pairs$plant)

# compute grams for each genera for each year
plant <- mast %>%
  filter(plotID %in% pplots) %>%
  left_join(nutrition, by = c('code', 'genus')) %>%
  select(-species, -oil, -protein, -carbs) %>%
  mutate(grams = mast * gmPerSeed) %>%
  group_by(plotID, year, genus) %>%
  summarise(grams = sum(grams)) %>%
  spread(genus, grams)
  


mdf <- function(site, mplot, pplot){
  pairs <- data.frame(mplot, pplot)
  pairs$mplot <- as.character(pairs$mplot)
  pairs$pplot <- as.character(pairs$pplot)
  pairs <- pairs %>%
   mutate(pair = paste(pplot, mplot, sep = '_'))

  assign(site, read.csv(paste0(mapath, site, '.csv')))  %>%
    select(plotID, collectDate, totalTraps, everything()) %>%
    select(-domainID, -siteID, -geodeticDatum, -nlcdClass, -elevation, -lat, -lon) %>%
    mutate(total = rowSums(.[,4:length(.)])) %>%
    left_join(pairs, by = c('plotID' = 'mplot')) %>%
    na.omit() %>%
    select(pair, collectDate, total, totalTraps, everything()) %>%
    assign(site, ., envir = .GlobalEnv)

}

mdf(siteBART, mplotBART, pplotBART)
mdf(siteBLAN, mplotBLAN, pplotBLAN)
mdf(siteGRSM, mplotGRSM, pplotGRSM)
mdf(siteHARV, mplotHARV, pplotHARV)
mdf(siteORNL, mplotORNL, pplotORNL)
mdf(siteSCBI, mplotSCBI, pplotSCBI)
mdf(siteSERC, mplotSERC, pplotSERC)

mammal <- bind_rows(BART, BLAN, GRSM, HARV, ORNL, SCBI, SERC) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  mutate(year = year(collectDate)) %>%
  select(pair, year, total, totalTraps, BLBR, PELE, SOCI, TAST) %>%
  group_by(year, pair) %>%
  summarise_all(sum) %>%
  filter(pair %in% gram$pair)
```

```{r model with total mast and t, t-1, t-2}
plant$total <- rowSums(plant[,3:length(plant)])

m18 <- mammal$pair[mammal$year == 2018]
p18 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2018]
p17 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2017]
p16 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2016]
set2018 <- Reduce(intersect, list(m18, p18, p17, p16))

m17 <- mammal$pair[mammal$year == 2017]
p17 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2017]
p16 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2016]
p15 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2015]
set2017 <- Reduce(intersect, list(m17, p17, p16, p15))

m16 <- mammal$pair[mammal$year == 2016]
p16 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2016]
p15 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2015]
p14 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2014]
set2016 <- Reduce(intersect, list(m16, p16, p15, p14))

m15 <- mammal$pair[mammal$year == 2015]
p15 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2015]
p14 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2014]
p13 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2013]
set2015 <- Reduce(intersect, list(m15, p15, p14, p13))

mammal2018 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2018) %>%
  filter(year == 2018)

mammal2017 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%
  filter(year == 2017)

mammal2016 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

mammal2015 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

mammal <- bind_rows(mammal2018, mammal2017, mammal2016, mammal2015)

plant2018t <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2018) %>%
  filter(year == 2018)

plant2017t <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%
  filter(year == 2017)

plant2016t <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

plant2015t <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

plantt <- bind_rows(plant2018t, plant2017t, plant2016t, plant2015t) %>%
  select(pair, total)

plant2017t_1 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2018) %>%
  filter(year == 2017)

plant2016t_1 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

plant2015t_1 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

plant2014t_1 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2014)

plantt_1 <- bind_rows(plant2017t_1, plant2016t_1, plant2015t_1, plant2014t_1) %>%
  select(pair, total)

plant2016t_2 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2018) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

plant2015t_2 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

plant2014t_2 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2014)

plant2013t_2 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2013)

plantt_2 <- bind_rows(plant2016t_2, plant2015t_2, plant2014t_2, plant2013t_2) %>%
  select(pair, total)

xdata <- plantt %>%
  rename(t = total) %>%
  mutate(t_1 = plantt_1$total, t_2 = plantt_2$total) %>%
  select(-pair)
xdata <- data.frame(xdata)

ydata <- mammal %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(BLBR, PELE, SOCI, TAST)
ydata <- data.frame(ydata)

edata <- mammal %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(totalTraps)

edata <- as.matrix(edata)
S <- length(ydata)
n <- length(ydata$BLBR)
ef <- list(columns = 1:S, values = edata)
formula <- as.formula(~ t+t_1+t_2)
modelList <- list(typeNames = c('DA'), effort = ef, ng = 10000, burnin = 1000)
pmTotalLag3Output <- gjam(formula = formula, xdata = xdata, ydata = ydata, modelList = modelList)

# gjam plots
pl <- list(GRIDPLOTS = TRUE, SAVEPLOTS = FALSE)
gjamPlot(output = pmTotalLag3Output, plotPars = pl)

```

```{r model with genera at t-1}
m18 <- mammal$pair[mammal$year == 2018]
p17 <- plant$pair[plant$year == 2017]

set2015 <- Reduce(intersect, list(m15, p14))

mammal2018 <- mammal %>%

mammal2017 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%

  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

mammal2014 <- mammal %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2014) %>%
  filter(year == 2014)

mammal <- bind_rows(mammal2018, mammal2017, mammal2016, mammal2015, mammal2014)

plant2018 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2018) %>%
  filter(year == 2017)

plant2017 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2017) %>%
  filter(year == 2016)

plant2016 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2016) %>%
  filter(year == 2015)

plant2015 <- plant %>%
  filter(pair %in% set2015) %>%
  filter(year == 2014)

  filter(pair %in% set2014) %>%

xdata <- bind_rows(plant2018, plant2017, plant2016, plant2015, plant2014) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(-year, -pair)

ydata <- mammal %>%
  ungroup %>%
  select(BLBR, PELE, SOCI, TAST)

  select(totalTraps)

paste(names(xdata), collapse='+')
  
edata <- as.matrix(edata)
S <- length(ydata)
n <- length(ydata$BLBR)
ef <- list(columns = 1:S, values = edata)
formula <- as.formula(~ Betula+Carya+Cornus+Fagus+Fraxinus+Ilex+Oxydendron+Picea+Pinus+Quercus+Tsuga)
modelList <- list(typeNames = c('DA'), effort = ef, ng = 10000, burnin = 1000)
pmHostOutput <- gjam(formula = formula, xdata = xdata, ydata = ydata, modelList = modelList)

# gjam plots
pl <- list(GRIDPLOTS = TRUE, SAVEPLOTS = FALSE)
gjamPlot(output = pmHostOutput, plotPars = pl)
```
